document_data.name: Ahmatot the Shiny
document_data.mainbody: '''Ahmatot the Shiny''' was a [[glabrezu]] Commander from the [[Demonweb Pits]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Ahmatot the Shiny was enveloped in orange radiance.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Gromph Baenre]], the [[drow]] [[Archmage]] of [[Menzoberranzan]], successfully activated the ''[[Realm Engine]]'' in order to summon [[Lolth]] to the City of Spiders. Even though the summoning failed, [[Abyssal]] incursion of the Demonweb Pits began spilling into the [[Prime Material plane]], threatening to swallow Menzoberranzan. Ahmatot the Shiny was one of the ranking Commanders who led the invading fiends into [[Narbondel]] and served Gromph Baenre.
